notes.title: Data availability
notes.p:
The base data used to construct the EAPP energy model is available as part of the supplementary material (Supplementary Tables 5– 15). A model file, of the EAPP’s electricity system, developed for this study has been deposited in the following Zenodo data repository
47 . All relevant source data for the figures in the main article and the supplementary material are also available in the same repository.
